snippet: A former student opened fire on students and staff at a Christian college on Monday morning, killing seven people and wounding at least three more, the authorities said.
abstract: Gunman opens fire on students and staff at Oikos University, a Christian college affiliated with a Korean-American church in Oakland, Calif, killing seven people and wounding at least three more; suspect, identified as former student One L Goh, turns himself in to police shortly after attack.

byline.original: By MALIA WOLLAN and NORIMITSU ONISHI
byline.contributor: Malia Wollan reported from Oakland, and Norimitsu Onishi from San Francisco.

lead_paragraph: A former student opened fire on students and staff at a Christian college on Monday morning, killing seven people and wounding at least three more, the authorities said.

headline.seo: Fatal Shootings at Oikos University in Oakland, Calif.
headline.main: Gunman Kills 7 in a Rampage at a Northern California University
headline.print_headline: Gunman Kills 7 in a Rampage at a Northern California University
